artist: Jack Larsen Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description:
3/8" horiz. strips of leather woven alternately with smooth and split side of hide on face. Olive warp. 1/8-3/8" cream, green & tan leather strips divided by tan threads form weft.
Stapled to 8.5x11" card.  "H-3" printed on card. (olive, tan, cream)
title: Leather Cloth
